player.title: JW FLV Player
player.author: LongTail Video
player.description: This is the JW FLV Player.

flashvar.name: controlbar
flashvar.description: Position of the controlbar. Can be set to bottom, over and none.

flashvar.name: skin
flashvar.description: The skin to be used by the player. To see what each skin looks like please visit the JW Player Skins Page .

flashvar.name: dock
flashvar.description: Set this to true to show the dock with large buttons in the top right of the player. Available since 4.5.

flashvar.name: autostart
flashvar.description: Automatically start playback on load.

flashvar.name: height
flashvar.description: Height of the display in pixels.

flashvar.name: width
flashvar.description: Width of the display in pixels.

flashvar.name: playerready
flashvar.description: Javascript callback when the player has completed its setup.

flashvar.name: icons
flashvar.description: Set this to false to hide the play button and buffering icon in the middle of the video.

flashvar.name: backcolor
flashvar.description: Background color (hex value) of the controlbar and playlist. This is white with the default skin.

flashvar.name: frontcolor
flashvar.description: Color (hex value) of all icons and texts in the controlbar and playlist as a hex code.

flashvar.name: lightcolor
flashvar.description: Color (hex value) of an icon or text when you rollover it with the mouse as a hex code.

flashvar.name: screencolor
flashvar.description: Background color (hex value) of the display as a hex code.

flashvar.name: item
flashvar.description: PlaylistItem that should start to play. Use this to start the player with a specific item selected.

flashvar.name: playlist.position
flashvar.description: Position of the playlist. Can be set to bottom, over, right or none.

flashvar.name: playlistsize
flashvar.description: When below this refers to the height, when right this refers to the width of the playlist.

flashvar.name: repeat
flashvar.description: What to do when the mediafile has ended.

flashvar.name: shuffle
flashvar.description: Randomly choose which playlist item to play.

flashvar.name: bufferlength
flashvar.description: Number of seconds of the file that has to be loaded before starting. Set this to a low value to enable instant-start and to a high value to get less mid-stream buffering.

flashvar.name: smoothing
flashvar.description: This sets the smoothing of videos, so you won't see blocks when a video is upscaled. Set this to false to get performance improvements with old computers / big files. Available since 4.4.

flashvar.name: stretching
flashvar.description: Defines how to resize images in the display. Can be none (no stretching), exactfit (disproportionate), uniform (stretch with black borders) or fill (uniform, but completely fill the display).

flashvar.name: wmode
flashvar.description: Sets the Window Mode property of the Flash movie for transparency, layering, and positioning in the browser.

flashvar.name: mute
flashvar.description: Mute all sounds on startup. This can be overridden by a user's cookie, which stores the user's last muting state.

flashvar.name: volume
flashvar.description: Startup volume of the player. Can be 0 to 100. The user's last volume setting is saved in a cookie and overrides this flashvar.

flashvar.name: provider
flashvar.description: this is determines what type of mediafile this item is, and thus which provider the player should use for playback. By default, the type is detected by the player based upon the file extension. If there's no suitable extension or the player detects the type wrong, it can be manually set.

flashvar.name: streamer
flashvar.description: location of an rtmp/http server instance to use for streaming. Can be an RTMP application or external PHP/ASP file.

flashvar.name: playlistfile
flashvar.description: Location of an XML playlist which will be loaded as the player starts.

flashvar.name: author
flashvar.description: Author of the video, shown in the display or playlist.

flashvar.name: date
flashvar.description: Publish date of the media file.

flashvar.name: description
flashvar.description: Text description of the file.

flashvar.name: duration
flashvar.description: duration of the file in seconds.

flashvar.name: file
flashvar.description: location of the mediafile or playlist to play.

flashvar.name: image
flashvar.description: location of a preview image; shown in display and playlist.

flashvar.name: link
flashvar.description: url to an external page the display, controlbar and playlist can link to.

flashvar.name: start
flashvar.description: position in seconds where playback has to start. Won't work for regular (progressive) videos, but only for streaming (HTTP/RTMP).

flashvar.name: tags
flashvar.description: keywords associated with the media file. Available since 4.3.

flashvar.name: title
flashvar.description: title of the video, shown in the display or playlist.
